problem_names: lemma atoms_of_cnf_Un: "atoms_of_cnf (S \<union> T) = atoms_of_cnf S \<union> atoms_of_cnf T"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms_of_cnf c = \<Union> ((`) atoms_of_lit ` c)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms_of_lit ` \<Union> c = \<Union> ((`) atoms_of_lit ` c)
(* alt as in the German alt *)
lemma atoms_of_cnf_Un: "atoms_of_cnf (S \<union> T) = atoms_of_cnf S \<union> atoms_of_cnf T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms_of_cnf (S \<union> T) = atoms_of_cnf S \<union> atoms_of_cnf T

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms_of_lit ` \<Union> (S \<union> T) =
    atoms_of_lit ` \<Union> S \<union> atoms_of_lit ` \<Union> T
